analysis.summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the test, indicating a possible critical issue that needs immediate attention. Investigate and resolve the issue to ensure proper page loading.
insights: Prioritizing performance optimization on the homepage can significantly improve user experience and reduce bounce rates.
Implementing a content delivery network (CDN) can help distribute content closer to users, reducing load times for all pages.
Regularly monitoring and addressing performance issues can maintain a high-quality user experience and contribute to better search engine rankings.
